metadata.description: Master content file - single source of truth for all ResumeOS content

summaries.title: B2B / Enterprise
summaries.contentLong: Umberto helps complex organizations figure out what their brand actually means - and then make it work harder. Over 15 years, he's partnered with enterprise leaders navigating messy realities: post-merger identity crises, product portfolios that don't cohere, and growth ambitions that outpace the story. His work spans the Fortune 500 - companies like General Electric, Deloitte, American Express, and Pfizer - where he's led positioning, architecture, and activation programs that turn internal complexity into external clarity. At Deloitte Digital, he built the Brand Strategy practice from inception into a $40M business, advising C-suite clients on how to make brand a strategic asset. He brings the rigor of consulting with the craft of creative - and a bias toward work that earns its place in the market.

summaries.title: Financial Services
summaries.contentLong: Umberto builds brands for financial services companies navigating a fundamental shift: from product-led positioning to customer-centric differentiation. Over 15 years, he's partnered with institutions like American Express, Capital One, New York Life, Synovus, and UBS to develop brand strategies that resonate in categories where trust is everything and switching costs are high. His work spans retail banking, wealth management, insurance, and corporate payments - always focused on translating complex value propositions into clear, compelling stories. At Deloitte Digital, he led engagements that connected brand strategy to business outcomes: CRM transformation, customer acquisition, and loyalty architecture. He understands the regulatory realities and competitive dynamics of financial services - and how to build brands that earn attention in a category defined by sameness.

summaries.title: Technology
summaries.contentLong: Umberto builds brands for technology companies at inflection points - the moments when product-market fit meets the need for market-defining positioning. Over 15 years, he's partnered with platforms, SaaS companies, and enterprise tech leaders including Salesforce, LTK, and PfizerForAll to develop brand strategies that translate technical capability into market relevance. His work spans B2B and B2C technology - from enterprise software positioning to consumer platform launches - always focused on the intersection of product truth and customer insight. At Deloitte Digital, he built AI-powered brand tools and led engagements connecting brand strategy to go-to-market execution. He understands how technology companies grow: the tension between product and marketing, the challenge of category creation, and the need for positioning that scales.

summaries.title: Consumer
summaries.contentLong: Umberto builds brands that consumers actually notice - and remember. Over 15 years, he's partnered with companies like OOFOS, Wild Turkey, MTN DEW, Ray-Ban, and the NWSL to develop positioning, campaigns, and activations that break through in crowded categories. His work spans CPG, retail, sports, and entertainment - always focused on finding the cultural tension that makes a brand matter. He's launched products that exceeded revenue forecasts by 131%, repositioned heritage brands for new audiences, and built platforms that drove double-digit growth. At Deloitte Digital, he brought strategic rigor to creative development - connecting consumer insight to business outcomes. He understands how attention works: the difference between awareness and relevance, and why most brand work gets ignored.

summaries.title: Creative Excellence
summaries.contentLong: Umberto builds brands that break through. Over 15 years, he's led creative work for companies like Pfizer, GE, NWSL, and NYU Langone that earned attention in competitive categories - and delivered measurable results. His campaigns have won Cannes Lions, Clios, and Webbys while driving outcomes like $727M in revenue, 50% attendance growth, and #1 market rankings. He's pioneered new formats - branded podcasts, VR experiences, creator-led campaigns - always in service of strategic objectives. At Deloitte Digital, he built the intersection of consulting rigor and creative craft, leading teams that could move from insight to execution. He believes great creative work isn't about awards - it's about solving business problems in ways that earn cultural relevance.

summaries.title: Product Marketing
summaries.contentLong: Umberto builds the strategic foundation that makes products succeed in market. Over 15 years, he's led positioning, messaging, and go-to-market strategy for launches spanning B2B platforms, healthcare innovations, and consumer products. His work includes Salesforce's unified brand architecture, PfizerForAll's DTC platform launch, and LTK's post-investment growth campaign - each connecting product truth to market opportunity. At Deloitte Digital, he built methodologies that bridge the gap between product and marketing: value proposition development, competitive positioning, and sales enablement. He understands the product marketing challenge: translating what you've built into why it matters, for audiences who have limited attention and unlimited alternatives.

summaries.title: Brand Strategy
summaries.contentLong: Umberto defines what brands stand for - and builds the systems that make it stick. Over 15 years, he's led brand strategy engagements for Fortune 500 companies including Deloitte, GE, American Express, and Pfizer - developing positioning, architecture, and messaging platforms that align organizations and differentiate in market. His work spans corporate repositioning, M&A brand integration, and portfolio architecture - always focused on turning strategic intent into executional clarity. At Deloitte Digital, he built the Brand Strategy practice from the ground up, creating methodologies that connect brand to business outcomes. He believes brand strategy isn't about taglines - it's about making choices that compound over time.

summaries.title: Performance / Growth
summaries.contentLong: Umberto connects brand strategy to growth outcomes. Over 15 years, he's led engagements that prove brand investment drives measurable results: customer acquisition, pipeline generation, and revenue growth. His work spans performance-oriented brand campaigns for companies like Synovus (64% revenue growth), OOFOS (54% customer acquisition), and Deloitte (43% lead generation) - each connecting strategic positioning to commercial outcomes. At Deloitte Digital, he built AI-powered CRM strategies and demand generation programs that demonstrated brand's role in the funnel. He understands the growth marketing challenge: the need to balance brand building with performance, and prove that positioning choices drive business results.

careerHighlights.title: Deloitte Practice
careerHighlights.contentLong: Recruited to launch Deloitte's brand strategy practice from the ground up. Built a team of 35+ strategists and scaled the business from $0 to $40M in revenue, establishing Deloitte Digital as a credible competitor to traditional brand consultancies and agencies.

variants.label: Practice Building
variants.content: Built brand strategy practice from inception to $40M, assembling 35+ strategists and developing proprietary methodologies. Created 10+ AI accelerators that improved client speed-to-market by 23%.

variants.label: Team Leadership
variants.content: Assembled cross-disciplinary team of 35+ strategists, designers, and storytellers while scaling practice from $0 to $40M. Developed talent pipeline and AI tools that lifted profitability by 17%.

variants.label: Business Development
variants.content: Grew brand strategy practice to $40M by developing differentiated positioning against agencies and consultancies. Built AI accelerators improving client speed-to-market by 23%, driving 3x growth in Fortune 500 engagements.

variants.label: Executive Advisory
variants.content: Established $40M brand advisory practice with C-suite credibility across Fortune 500 clients. Led team of 35+ strategists advising CMOs and CEOs on brand-led transformation.

variants.label: Transformation & Scale
variants.content: Transformed brand consulting into $40M growth engine through strategic engagements that repositioned legacy brands. Developed AI accelerators improving client speed-to-market by 23%.

careerHighlights.title: NWSL
careerHighlights.contentLong: Partnered with professional sports league at pivotal growth moment to define its first comprehensive brand strategy. Developed positioning, visual identity system, and go-to-market approach that contributed to 50% YoY attendance growth and a landmark $60M media rights deal—a 40x increase in valuation.

variants.label: Brand Strategy
variants.content: Defined comprehensive brand strategy for professional sports league at inflection point. Developed market positioning and brand platform driving 50% YoY attendance and $60M media rights deal—a 40x value increase.

variants.label: Growth Strategy
variants.content: Established 5-year growth path for national sports league through fan acquisition strategy and go-to-market planning. Delivered 50% attendance growth in year one, 26% in year two, and $60M media deal.

variants.label: Integrated Campaign
variants.content: Launched nationwide campaign for women's sports league, partnering with franchise marketing and merchandising teams. Drove 50% attendance growth and secured $60M media rights deal.

variants.label: Commercial & Partnerships
variants.content: Increased commercial value of professional sports league by 40x through brand strategy that attracted new sponsors and media investment. Secured $60M media rights deal while driving 50% attendance growth.

variants.label: Cultural Impact
variants.content: Elevated sports league from regional interest to national phenomenon through content-driven fan engagement. Achieved 50% YoY attendance growth and $60M media rights deal representing 40x value increase.

careerHighlights.title: OOFOS
careerHighlights.contentLong: Partnered with athletic recovery brand to transform from niche player into category leader. Developed segmentation strategy, brand platform, and integrated campaign that drove 54% increase in customer acquisition and 191% revenue growth.

variants.content: Scaled DTC footwear brand through e-commerce transformation and revamped digital experience. Delivered 191% sales increase, 54% new customer acquisition, and 47% lift in web traffic.

variants.label: Segmentation & Growth
variants.content: Developed segmentation-led growth strategy identifying key audiences and need states for recovery footwear brand. Achieved 54% increase in new customer acquisition and 191% sales growth.

variants.label: Integrated Campaign
variants.content: Launched integrated omnichannel campaign for recovery footwear brand, capitalizing on cultural moments and customer need states. Drove 191% sales increase and 54% new customer acquisition.

careerHighlights.contentLong: Led the end-to-end repositioning of Deloitte's corporate brand to expand market perception beyond audit. Developed 'Only See Possible' platform and integrated campaign that drove 43% increase in lead generation and 33% lift in brand relevancy across five priority sectors.

variants.content: Elevated Deloitte's perception among C-suite executives through comprehensive brand architecture transformation. Generated 43% increase in qualified opportunities and 33% improvement in brand relevance.

variants.content: Launched pharmaceutical company's first DTC platform, developing end-to-end strategy from brand positioning to customer experience design. Generated $727M in revenue, exceeding forecasts by 20%.

variants.content: Expanded pharma giant into consumer health through first DTC platform. Built consumer-centric brand strategy and digital engagement model delivering $727M revenue, exceeding forecasts by 20%.

variants.label: Customer Experience
variants.content: Reimagined patient engagement for pharmaceutical leader through first-of-kind DTC platform. Designed customer experience and digital engagement model generating $727M in revenue, exceeding forecasts by 20%.

variants.label: Integrated Campaign

variants.label: Growth & Acquisition

careerHighlights.title: GE Innovation
careerHighlights.contentLong: Pioneered award-winning media innovation for Fortune 50 manufacturer including branded podcast that reached #1 on iTunes and VR experience distributed to 1M consumers. Work earned Cannes Grand Prix, Clio, and Webby recognition while driving 4x engagement increase.

variants.label: Brand Storytelling
variants.content: Transformed industrial brand into cultural storyteller through breakthrough platforms including science fiction podcast reaching #1 on iTunes and VR experience distributed to 1M consumers. Earned Cannes Grand Prix while driving 4x engagement increase.

variants.label: Emerging Media
variants.content: Pioneered emerging media for Fortune 50 manufacturer through first-to-market branded entertainment across podcast and VR. Achieved #1 iTunes ranking, distributed 1M VR headsets, and earned Cannes Grand Prix.

variants.label: Award-Winning Creative
variants.content: Delivered award-winning creative for industrial brand through platforms that redefined category expectations. Earned Cannes Grand Prix, Clio, and Webby recognition while driving 4x engagement increase.

variants.label: Partnerships & Scale
variants.content: Scaled branded content through strategic media partnership with The New York Times, delivering immersive VR experience to 1M consumers. Earned Cannes Grand Prix and drove 4x engagement increase.

careerHighlights.contentLong: Spearheaded development of AI-powered brand strategy tools including generative content systems, automated brand audits, and personalization engines. Tools reduced production time by 40% while improving content relevance and enabling scale across global client engagements.

variants.label: AI Innovation
variants.content: Built AI-powered brand strategy toolkit including generative content systems and automated audits. Tools reduced production time by 40% while improving content relevance across global engagements.

variants.label: Operational Efficiency
variants.content: Developed AI tools that transformed brand strategy workflow, reducing production time by 40% and enabling consistent quality at scale across global client portfolio.

variants.label: Personalization at Scale
variants.content: Created AI-powered personalization engines enabling brand customization across markets and segments. Reduced production time by 40% while improving content relevance.

variants.label: Speed-to-Market
variants.content: Built AI accelerators that compressed brand development timelines by 40%, enabling faster client delivery without sacrificing strategic rigor or creative quality.

overviews.title: Deloitte Digital SVP
overviews.contentLong: Promoted to lead Deloitte's Brand Strategy & Activation practice during a time when the firm was aggressively expanding into creative and marketing services. Built the practice from $15M to $40M in revenue by assembling a team of 35+ strategists and establishing credibility with Fortune 500 CMOs seeking an alternative to traditional agencies.

overviews.contentLong: Recruited to establish a new brand consulting model that bridges creative excellence with strategic rigor. Built methodology and team that could compete with both agencies and consultancies, delivering integrated brand strategy engagements for Fortune 500 clients.

overviews.title: Omnicom Media Group VP
overviews.contentLong: Promoted to lead innovation across brand, technology, and consumer experience—helping clients navigate the shift from traditional media to integrated, data-driven marketing approaches.

overviews.title: Berlin Cameron
overviews.contentLong: Supported brand positioning and campaign development across consumer, tech, and financial services clients as part of integrated creative team.

P1.title: Amex CRM
P1.contentLong: Modernized CRM strategy for a portfolio of clients across financial services, hospitality, and retail by replacing legacy journey-based models with a dynamic, moments-based engagement framework powered by AI and predictive personalization. Designed and implemented automated content systems and GenAI-enabled tools that accelerated execution, improved message relevance, and unlocked more personalized brand experiences at scale. On average, this approach delivered a 5% lift in customer retention, a 12% increase in cross-sell performance, and a 32% reduction in production costs.

variants.contentLong: Defined brand strategy for professional sports league at inflection point. Developed market positioning and brand platform driving 50% YoY attendance and $60M media rights deal—a 40x value increase.

variants.label: Growth Strategy
variants.contentLong: Established 5-year growth path for national sports league through fan acquisition strategy and go-to-market planning. Delivered 50% attendance growth in year one, 26% in year two, and $60M media deal.

variants.label: Integrated Campaign
variants.contentLong: Launched nationwide campaign for women's sports league, partnering with franchise marketing and merchandising teams. Drove 50% attendance growth and secured $60M media rights deal.

variants.label: Commercial & Partnerships
variants.contentLong: Increased commercial value of professional sports league by 40x through brand strategy that attracted new sponsors and media investment. Secured $60M media rights deal while driving 50% attendance growth.

variants.label: Cultural Impact
variants.contentLong: Elevated sports league from regional interest to national phenomenon through content-driven fan engagement. Achieved 50% YoY attendance growth and $60M media rights deal representing 40x value increase.

P2.title: PfizerForAll
P2.contentLong: Launched a pharmaceutical company's first direct-to-consumer platform during the pandemic, developing a first-of-its-kind customer experience and digital engagement model that generated $727M in revenue, exceeding forecasts by 20%.

variants.label: Digital Health Innovation
variants.contentLong: Launched pharmaceutical company's first DTC platform, developing end-to-end strategy from brand positioning to customer experience design. Generated $727M in revenue, exceeding forecasts by 20%.

variants.label: Product Marketing
variants.contentLong: Developed product positioning strategy for first-of-kind DTC healthcare platform, defining value proposition, messaging, and launch activation. Delivered $727M revenue, outperforming forecasts by 20%.

variants.label: Go-to-Market Excellence
variants.contentLong: Expanded pharma giant into consumer health through first DTC platform. Built consumer-centric brand strategy and digital engagement model delivering $727M revenue, exceeding forecasts by 20%.

variants.label: Customer Experience
variants.contentLong: Reimagined patient engagement for pharmaceutical leader through first-of-kind DTC platform. Designed customer experience and digital engagement model generating $727M in revenue, exceeding forecasts by 20%.

P3.title: Ray-Ban
P3.contentLong: Spearheaded a go-to-market transformation for Ray-Ban North America to address declining relevance among younger consumers. Work drove 72% increase in digital engagement and 29% lift in brand awareness.

P3.title: Soap & Glory
P3.contentLong: Developed and activated the first U.S. national campaign for Soap & Glory following its acquisition, driving 33% increase in awareness, 17% conversion lift, and 18% improvement in online performance.

P3.title: Retail Media
P3.contentLong: For decades, media had been treated as a cost center by most retail brands. Built strategic framework positioning media as revenue driver, establishing foundation for retail media network approach.

P4.title: GE Podcast
P4.contentLong: Pioneered branded audio storytelling by launching The Message podcast for GE, which became a top-charting iTunes hit and earned industry acclaim including a Cannes Lion, Clio Award, and Webby recognition—cementing GE as a leader in innovative brand storytelling.

variants.label: Brand Storytelling
variants.contentLong: Transformed industrial brand into cultural storyteller through breakthrough platforms including science fiction podcast reaching #1 on iTunes and VR experience distributed to 1M consumers. Earned Cannes Grand Prix while driving 4x engagement increase.

variants.label: Emerging Media
variants.contentLong: Pioneered emerging media for Fortune 50 manufacturer through first-to-market branded entertainment across podcast and VR. Achieved #1 iTunes ranking, distributed 1M VR headsets, and earned Cannes Grand Prix.

variants.label: Award-Winning Creative
variants.contentLong: Delivered award-winning creative for industrial brand through platforms that redefined category expectations. Earned Cannes Grand Prix, Clio, and Webby recognition while driving 4x engagement increase.

variants.label: Partnerships & Scale
variants.contentLong: Scaled branded content through strategic media partnership with The New York Times, delivering immersive VR experience to 1M consumers. Earned Cannes Grand Prix and drove 4x engagement increase.

P4.title: GE VR
P4.contentLong: Directed one of the largest distributed virtual reality brand campaigns ever executed, partnering with The New York Times to distribute 1M VR headsets and deliver immersive GE content to consumers.

P5.title: Walgreens Boots Alliance
P5.contentLong: Supported the global rebranding of Walgreens Boots Alliance following its cross-border merger, helping establish unified brand architecture across 8,000+ locations in 25 countries.

P5.title: Teva
P5.contentLong: Led product architecture and brand strategy for Teva's U.S. generics portfolio, developing framework to manage 100+ product SKUs under coherent brand system.

P6.title: TIAA
P6.contentLong: Contributed to the rebrand of a global financial services company by supporting positioning development, messaging, and stakeholder alignment for organization serving 50,000+ employees.
